item.title: Plazi Members
item.description: Donat Agosti Taxonomic literature, systematics and conservation President Plazi Director Plazi GmbH Research Associate Naturhistorisches Museum, Bern Berne, Switzerland agosti@plazi.org Klemens Böhm Member of Board (2008-) Professor Lehrstuhl für Systeme der Informationsverwaltung Karlsruher Institute of Technology Karlsruhe, GERMANY boehm@kit.edu Terry Catapano Lead developer of TaxonX XML schema and Taxpub Extension of the NLM/NCBI JATS DTD Vice-President Plazi Columbia University New York, USA catapano@plazi.org Hong Cui Natural language processing, character modeling
